name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:

I have a proven track record in game development, creating high-performance tools that enhance workflows and streamline processes. My depth of knowledge enables me to integrate complex systems while maintaining compliance and performance standards.

I have successfully led enterprise-level projects that utilize predictive analytics and AI/ML capabilities, ensuring robust and scalable solutions.
